channel.title: Making it so instead of destroying you drop
channel.description: So the last thing i need help with is i cant figure out how to change it from destroying the item to just dropping it on the ground? anyhelp

item.title: Making it so instead of destroying you drop
item.dc:creator: @Shadow742000 Shadow742000
item.description:
@Shadow742000 wrote:

look in client.java for “notrade” and remove the item id from that. or if you have pi i think you search iten_tradeable

Read full topic
item.source: Making it so instead of destroying you drop

item.title: Making it so instead of destroying you drop
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Find the message you get when you try to drop the item. Then, instead of sending that message have the server create a global item for the item dropped.

Read full topic
